identifier: Material ontology in the context of supply and value chain of the automotive industry. Exchange of material information and knowledge.

definition_en: Things that are used for the production of a product.

synonyms_en: commodity, feedstock, unprocessed material, primary commodity

definition_en: Raw material that are yielded from natural resources.
Raw material that yielded from recycling of waste.
A material that is used in the production of a product and becomes part of the product.
synonyms_en: engineering material, engineered material, technische Werkstoff

definition_en: A material that is used in small amounts in the production of a product and becomes part of the product.
A material that is used for production and does not become part of the product.
anything that has mass and takes up space
